diff_hunk:
@@ -46,6 +46,19 @@ def __init__(self, probs=None, logits=None, validate_args=None):
             batch_shape = self._param.size()
         super(Bernoulli, self).__init__(batch_shape, validate_args=validate_args)
 
+    def expand(self, batch_shape):
+        batch_shape = torch.Size(batch_shape)
+        new = self.__new__(Bernoulli)
body: Yes, that would be better. Rather than trying to do something by default, it's better to throw this error since its not currently possible to `.expand` without making any assumptions about `.__init__` (e.g. we may introduce some new parameters that would additionally require broadcasting).
body_html: Yes, that would be better. Rather than trying to do something by default, it's better to throw this error since its not currently possible to .expand without making any assumptions about .__init__ (e.g. we may introduce some new parameters that would additionally require broadcasting).
